altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢EPISODE.Gレクイエム

description.en: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.

title.en: Devil May Cry 5 – Visions of V –

description.en: The spin-off of the latest title, *Devil May Cry 5,* has begun with a bang! The main character is "V," a mysterious man who uses three demons. In addition to the secret of his birth, his encounter with the demons, and the prequel to the main story leading up to the contract, the tale is told from the perspective of V that is exclusive to the spin-off!
description.ru: Спин-офф игры Devil May Cry 5, показывающий историю с точки зрения Ви. В агентстве "Devil May Cry" новый клиент - таинственный Ви. Его заказ "убить могущественного демона, который скоро восстанет" мог бы показаться для Данте обычным делом, если бы не одно но... Этот демон - брат Данте, Вергилий!
description.tr: *Devil May Cry 5*'in mangası olan bu kitap, V karakterini konu alır. Olayları birden V'nin beyni ve gözleri ile görün...

title.en: Sono Munou, Jitsu wa Sekai Saikyou no Mahoutsukai

altTitles.ja: その無能、実は世界最強の魔法使い
その無能、実は世界最強の魔法使い　〜無能と蔑まれ、貴族家から追い出されたが、ギフト《転生者》が覚醒して前世の能力が蘇った〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Sono Munou, Jitsu wa Sekai Saikyou no Mahoutsukai: Munou to Sagesumare, Kizokuka kara Oidasareta ga, Gift "Tenseisha" ga Kakusei shite Zense no Nouryoku ga Yomigaetta

altTitles.en: That Incompetent Is Actually the World's Strongest Wizard

That Incompetent Is Actually the World's Strongest Wizard: He Was Scorned as Incompetent and Kicked out of His Aristocratic Family, but His Gift of "Reincarnation" Awakened and Brought Back the Abilities of His Previous Life

description.en:
Alma, the third son of an aristocratic family who could not receive the Gift that should have been given by God, is despised as incompetent from his parents' home and is expelled from the house. 

However, in reality, Alma was given a special Gift - He regained the abilities of the previous life! With the Gift [Reincarnation], he becomes the strongest wizard in the world! 

Alma, who devoted all of his first life to the quest for magic, seeks a "happy second life" with the magic of his previous life! 

---

[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3823gm/)  (JP)

---
description.ja: この世界の人々は15歳になると、女神様から《ギフト》と呼ばれる様々な能力を与えられる。貴族家の三男・アルマも優秀な《ギフト》を授かることを期待されていたが、なぜか《ギフト》はまったく発現せず、実家から無能と蔑まれ追い出されてしまう…。だが、実はアルマは特別な《ギフト》を授かっていたーー。その能力《転生者》によって前世の記憶と能力を取り戻したアルマは、この世界で最強の魔法使いとなった！一度目の人生の全てを魔法の探究に捧げたアルマが、前世で極めた魔法で”幸せな二度目の人生”へと歩み出す！

title.en: Yameru Hoshi yori Ai wo Komete

altTitles.ja: 病める惑星より愛をこめて

description.en: Suicide is a daily occurrence for people on this planet, where they coexist with "Fluffy," a special clinical creature provided by aliens with the ability to give super-powerful healing to its hosts. What is the drama for people living in this strange world?

title.en: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms
Kuroiwa Medaka is Proof Against My Cuteness

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!! しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

altTitles.ja: 幽闇のカナタ

description.en: The presence of 'it' can be felt everywhere. Kanata, a woman who lost her sense of fear after a certain incident, searches for moments that freeze her heart as she follows the traces of 'it'...!? In parks, on emergency staircases, and in the cracks between walls, people who accidentally draw close to the presence of 'it' experience indescribable terror, leaving their everyday lives irreparably changed. After all, ghosts really are the scariest...

Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

altTitles.ja: さらい屋五葉

description.en: Masterless samurai Akitsu Masanosuke is a skilled and loyal swordsman, but his naïve, diffident nature has time and again caused him to be let go by the lords who have employed him. Hungry and desperate, he becomes a bodyguard for Yaichi, the charismatic leader of a gang called "Five Leaves." Although disturbed by the gang's sinister activities, Masa begins to suspect that Yaichi's motivations are not what they seem. And despite his misgivings, the deeper he's drawn into the world of the Five Leaves, the more he finds himself fascinated by these devious, mysterious outlaws.

title.en: Kami-sama ga Koi wo shiro to Itte iru!

altTitles.en: God is Telling Me to Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: 神様が恋をしろと言っている！

altTitles.zh-hk: 神明大人对我说快去恋爱吧

description.en: Chiyoko, in her second year of high school, transfers to a co-ed school due to her dad's job transfer. Since she's only attended an all-girls school since junior high, she excitedly plans to fall in love in her new school. Out of the blue, she begins to see the love meters of 5 hotties and an options window as if she were in an otome game?! She encounters various types such as a glasses boy, a playboy underclassman, and a mysterious senior. Meet-cutes with boys come one after another. This is the beginning of a real otome game school life!

altTitles.th: ยอดเชฟของโนบุนางะ

altTitles.ja: 信長のシェフ

description.en: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best – he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?
description.ja: 現代の料理人・ケン。彼が目を覚ますとそこは戦国時代だった。京で評判の料理の噂を聞きつけた信長は、強引にケンを自分の料理人にするが…！？
description.es-la: Ken es un chef de la actualidad. Cuando se despierta, se encuentra en el período de los Estados en Guerra, la era Sengoku. Nobunaga oye un rumor sobre un plato con buena reputación en Kioto, y obliga a Ken a convertirse en su propio chef...
description.pt-br: Ken, um chef da era moderna, encontra-se de volta ao século 16, durante o período Sengoku. Sem qualquer lembrança de quem ele foi um dia ou como chegou ali, ele só pode contar com seu conhecimento e suas habilidades na culinárias. Mas, assim que ele ganha reputação por sua incrível comida, o próprio Oda Nobunaga aparece para demandar seus serviços.

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z sąsiedztwa niezwykle mnie rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

title.en: Tale of a Scribe Who Retires to the Countryside

altTitles.ja: 落郷文士伝

description.en:
A scholar who failed the national exams is picked up by a martial arts master and given the task to record his life into a book. Through their journey, Son Bin meets many great people and soon finds himself following the same path as the master, as the Martial Arts King.   

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.fr:
Un écrivain qui a échoué aux examens nationaux est recruté par un maître d'arts martiaux et chargé de consigner sa vie dans un livre. À travers leur voyage, Son Bin rencontre de nombreuses personnes formidables et se retrouve bientôt sur la même voie que le maître, pour devenir le roi des arts martiaux.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.it:
Uno studente che non ha superato gli esami nazionali viene raccolto da un maestro di arti marziali e gli viene assegnato il compito di registrare la sua vita in un libro. Durante il loro viaggio, Son Bin incontra molte persone fantastiche e presto si ritrova a seguire lo stesso percorso del maestro, come il Re delle Arti Marziali.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ja:
不正だらけの科挙に落ちて挫折した孫賓の前に現れた獅子 虩は自分の戦記の記録を彼に頼む。孫賓は獅子 虩の戦記を記録することで初めて武林の世界に足を踏み入れることになる。

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ko:
온갖 비리가 가득한 과거 시험에 낙방해 좌절한 주인공 손빈. 
자신의 신세를 한탄하는 손빈 앞에 나타난 사자혁은 그에게 자신의 일대기를 기록할 것을 청한다. 
이후 둘은 함께 천하를 주유하게 되는데, 과연 그가 써 내려가는 무림 일대기는 어떠한 기록을 남기게 되고, 무림 세계에 발을 들이게 된 손빈의 운명은 어찌 흘러갈는지……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ru:
Завалив экзамен на государственного чиновника, молодой ученый Сон Бин решает утопить свое горе в алкоголе, но по велению судьбы встречает великого воина Мурима, Са Джахека, разглядевшего в нем потенциал.
«Все, что не записано, навсегда становится утерянным и захороненным».
Са Джахек приглашает беспристрастного юношу написать мемуары о его великих подвигах и заключает с ним сделку: Сон Бин может бежать куда угодно, но, если спустя 3 дня воин найдет его, юноша последует за ним...
Какую историю запишет кисть молодого ученого? Как сложится его дальнейшая судьба в этом мире?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh:
落榜书生巧遇玄天武帝，
浪迹人间书写笔下江湖！
孙斌是个仕途多舛的贫苦文士，某天在酒馆失意买醉之时遇到了武林强者——史子赫。史子赫为了让自己的一生能够名留青史，于是让孙斌跟在他身边，将他的辉煌一生记录下来写成传记。就这样孙斌开始和史子赫周游各地，开阔眼界。终于领悟什么才是真正的强大……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh-hk:
於所有腐敗的科舉考試中落榜而感到挫折的主角——孫斌。然而，一名叫司子奕的男子出現在感嘆自己身世的孫斌面前，並要求他記載自己的生平傳記。之後兩人一起周遊天下，究竟他筆下的武林傳記會留下什麼樣的紀錄，而踏入武林世界的孫斌，命運又將會走向何處……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)

title.en: Return of the Sword God-Rank Civil Servant

altTitles.en: Return of the High-Ranking Civil Servant

altTitles.es: La regresión del funcionario de gobierno más fuerte

description.en:
Ahn Su-ho. was the Sword God. Surprisingly, humanity's greatest swordsman player was a civil servant hunter affiliated with the Korean Hunter Association. Su-ho chose the path of a public servant purely to end the gates. Perhaps that’s why when one of the disaster-level gates, called the final gate, was attacked, In an ironic turn of events, he was betrayed by his comrades. 

"It would have been better if he had joined us from the beginning. Public servants are so stubborn." 

The reason his comrades betrayed him? Because if the gates were closed, their influence would disappear. Is this the end? Just as Su-ho’s consciousness was fading away, 
[Rebooting the system of player Ahn Su-ho.] 

The system gave Su-ho one more chance. A chance to go back to the past and set everything right.
description.ko:
인류 최고의 검사이자 대한헌터협회 소속 공무원 헌터, 안수호. 게이트의 종식을 위해 공직자가 된 그는최후의 게이트라 불리는 재앙급 게이트들 중에 하나가 공략되었을 때 동료들에게 배신당하고 말았다.

동료들이 그를 배신한 이유? 게이트가 종식되면 그들의 권력이 사라지기 때문. 이렇게 끝인 걸까? 수호의 의식이 흐려져갈 때쯤!

[안수호 플레이어의 시스템을 재부팅합니다.]

시스템은 수호에게 한 번 더 기회를 부여했다. 바로 과거로 돌아가 모든 걸 바로잡을 수 있는 기회를.

altTitles.ja: 八乙女×２

description.en:
Yaotome Kai is a sixth grade elementary school student with a new neighbor living in the apartment next door. The slightly weird girl Yaotome Haruru. Eating school lunches, having likes and dislikes, and forgetting things as elementary school students do. Casually hanging out whilst their parents get along, as next-door neighbors do.

The latest work by "Seitokai Yakuindomo" author Ujiie Tozen.

A comedy of two elementary school neighbors.

(Source: Pocket Shounen Magazine, translated)

After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

Chan-Woo finds it difficult talking to Sul-Hee, who always seems to be angry about something. However, what he says to her actually makes her heart beat like crazy! A sweet, romantic story of a young couple’s first love!

(Source: Toptoon Plus)

**Links:**
- Promotional Video - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/YB-GVf_HXLk)
- Defunct Official English - [Toptoon Plus](https://toptoonplus.com/comic/100306)
description.es: A Chan-Woo le resulta difícil hablar con Sul-Hee, que siempre parece estar enfadada por algo. Sin embargo, lo que le dice hace que su corazón lata como un loco. Una dulce y romántica historia del primer amor de una joven pareja.
description.fr: Chan-Woo a du mal à parler à Sul-Hee, car elle a toujours l'air énervée. Cependant, ce qu'il lui dit ne la laisse pas indifférente ! Une douce et romantique histoire sur le premier amour d'un jeune couple !
description.id: Chan-woo kesulitan berbicara dengan Sul-hee, yang sepertinya selalu marah tentang sesuatu. Namun, apa yang dia katakan padanya benar-benar membuat detak jantungnya gila! Kisah manis dan romantis tentang cinta pertama pasangan muda!
description.ko:
무뚝뚝한 찬우, 그 옆자리 차가운 설희.
문득 던진 찬우의 한마디 말에 얼음같던 설희의 심장이 요동치기 시작한다.
10대 고교생의 서툴고 달콤한 첫 사랑!

[PV](https://youtu.be/YB-GVf_HXLk)
description.pt-br: Chan-Woo acha difícil falar com Sul-Hee, que sempre parece estar com raiva de alguma coisa. No entanto, o que ele diz a ela realmente faz seu coração bater loucamente! Uma doce e romântica história do primeiro amor de um jovem casal!

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

Kuruto gets kicked out of the hero's party for being too useless in combat. However unknown to him, he's SSS Rank in skills like cooking, building, magic tool crafting, etc.

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en: High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women. Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again. However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five!
description.ja:
本物の恋心を、あなたは見抜けるか。

女性を恐れる男子高校生・大石饗。彼に突然告白してきた、5人の少女。そのうち4人は、人間の恋愛感情を喰らう生物「恋喰（こいばみ）」。彼女たちに恋愛感情を食べられると、二度と恋をすることができなくなってしまう。ただ、本当の告白をした1人の気持ちを、見捨てるわけにはいかない――饗は覚悟を決め、5人の中から、本命の1人を見つけだすことを決意する！
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

altTitles.ja: 3月のライオン

altTitles.th: ตราบวันฟ้าใส

altTitles.pt-br: Sangatsu no Lion – O Leão de Março

altTitles.de: Der März kommt wie ein Löwe

description.en:
A youth named Kiriyama Rei, who lost his family as a child, endures loneliness to become a professional shogi player. Then, through a chance meeting, he develops a relationship with the three Kawamoto sisters (Akari, Hinata, Momo), who hail from a working-class district of the city, and little by little his frozen heart begins to thaw.  
 
--- 
- **Won the 4th Manga Taisho Award in 2011**  
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2011, which it shared with Space Brothers**
-  **Won the 18th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2014**
description.pt-br: Kiriyama Rei tem 17 anos e é um jogador profissional de shogi, mas na vida real, ele não tem nada. Calmo e não muito social, Rei não tem família, sem amigos, e ele não vai à escola. Ele é apenas familiarizado com uma mulher chamada Akari, que é sua vizinha que mora sozinha com suas duas irmãs mais novas, Momo e Hinata. Este é um mangá seinen dia-a-dia, com monólogos fortes e as reflexões Rei.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

title.en: Gyaru, Plain Girl and Hand/Lip Cream

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

altTitles.zh: 孤單一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.zh-ro: Duzi Yi Ren De Yi Shijie Gonglüe

altTitles.zh-hk: 獨自一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.th: นายโดดเดี่ยวพิชิตต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

altTitles.vi: Hành Trình Cô Độc Nơi Dị Giới

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.vi: Câu chuyện theo chân Haruka - một cậu học sinh trung học mọt sách cô độc, đột nhiên bị triệu hồi đến dị giới với đám bạn học. Không giống như cả lớp nhận được các kỹ năng cheat đủ để làm bá chủ tại thế giới khác, nhân vật chính của chúng ta phải ôm theo bảng trạng thái phế vật mà lăn lộn hòng sống sót. Vậy thì, hãy cùng dõi theo và cổ vũ cho Haruka có thể tai qua nạn khỏi, vươn đến đỉnh cao mà không cần tới cheat trong câu chuyện tràn đầy hài hước này nhé.
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

description.en:
The sequel to Konjiki no Gash!!, aka Zatch Bell.

Once the battle to decide the king of the demon world, in which 100 demon children fought against each other, had come to an end… the king of the demon world was crowned, and the demon world lived out the rest of its days in peace.

Or at least, that was how it was supposed to be.

Now, a shocking fact about the current state of the demon world comes to light. And in the depths of their despair, three demon children decide to risk it all for one last chance at survival.
description.it: Dopo la battaglia per decidere il re del mondo dei demoni, in cui 100 bambini demoni si sono combattuti tra loro... Fu deciso il re del mondo dei demoni e arrivarono giorni di pace... o almeno così si supponeva! Fatti scioccanti vengono rivelati sull'attuale mondo dei demoni. Al limite della disperazione, tre bambini demone fanno una scommessa!
description.pt-br: Uma vez terminada a batalha para decidir o Rei do mundo demoníaco, na qual 100 mamodos lutaram uns contra os outros… o Rei do mundo demoníaco foi coroado, e o mundo demoníaco viveu o resto de seus dias em paz.

description.en:
I am a hungry Vampire. I longed to suck the blood of my destined one, which is said to be the finest, but somehow I satisfied my hunger on social media as an internet influencer. But one day, I got a hateful comment--.

Based on the song Vampire by DECO*27
description.ja:
私は飢えたヴァンパイア。
極上といわれる運命の人の血を吸うことに憧れ、ひょんなことからインフルエンサーとしてSNSで飢餓感を満たしていた。
しかしあるときアンチコメントがきて――。

再生数5000万回超!!人気ボカロP・DECO*27の中毒必至ヒット曲をコミカライズ！
description.pt-br:
Eu sou uma vampira faminta. Eu ansiava por sugar o sangue do meu destinado, que dizem ser o melhor, mas de alguma forma eu saciei minha fome nas redes sociais como um influenciadora da internet. Mas um dia, recebi um comentário odioso.

Baseado na música Vampire de DECO*27

description.en:
Kikuru Madan, a monster hunter with excellent performance because of his particular job in the forest, decides to quit his job because he doesn't want to waste his youth. The reason he wants to quit was that one of his friends got married. One day there is a new recruit. Enome the Guild Receptionist asks him to accompany Hitamuki Kyan the Lolipai Martial Artist to watch her back and teach her how to work. He accepts the request, half because he was worried about her and half because he wanted her to become his successor before he retires completely. Sadly, his plan to retire is derailed by Hitamuki being useless and always attracting some monster. Can Kikuru Madan retire peacefully, despite being saddled with a useless newbie?  
  
Hunting erotic commentary enthusiastically!
description.ja: へっぽこ武道家、つんけん白魔、ものぐさ黒魔、酔いどれ戦士、４人の新米ガード達は街の平和を守るため、魔物に立ち向かうが、ことごとく凌辱を受けることに…
description.es-la: Las cuatro guardias novatas -una artista marcial cabeza hueca, un demonio blanco pellizcado, un demonio negro perezoso y una guerrera borracha- se enfrentan a los demonios para proteger la paz de la ciudad, pero son humilladas a cada paso...

description.en: Earth's weakest becomes the universe's strongest with cheat abilities–!? While all of humanity awakens to their powers due to the invasion of extraterrestrial life forms (EVA), the protagonist Vi is the only one without abilities. Just as he's about to die, devoured by an EVA, a cheat-level ability activates… A highly anticipated modern battle fantasy!

altTitles.zh-hk: 本是職業高爾夫選手的我轉生成妹妹的推桿

description.en:
On the green of the All Japan Open final, professional golfer Kazuma Yagami is killed by a lightning strike just before he is about to win! His soul, unable to leave his sister behind, resides in the putter he was carrying at the time, and his younger sister, Ryoko, who inherited the putter, decides to win the tour championship using only her brother's putter!


In order to become a professional golfer, Ryoko enrolls in the prestigious Seven Two Academy, where the elite golfers gather. The challenge of the two of them together is about to begin. ----!
description.ja: 兄の遺志を受け継ぎ、パター１本でのツアー優勝を目指す女子校生・火神リョーコ！ゴルフの名門・私立七十二学園に入学し、並み居るライバルとの決闘【デュエル】に挑む―――！！

altTitles.ja: バトゥーキ

description.en:
The story of a middle school girl trying to find herself in the confusion of adolescence. 
Skateboard-loving Ichiri Sanjou, nicknamed "Icchi," may look like a normal energetic girl, 
but whenever she sees the full moon she is hit with a wave of emotions she cannot comprehend.
She decides to start learning the Brasilian martial art of Capoeira to keep them in check, 
unaware she's setting a potentially devastating chain of events in motion.  

From the mind behind [Usogui](https://mangadex.org/title/a07320a4-afcd-413a-a451-d69a448d0c28/usogui), Toshio Sako.
description.pt-br: A história de uma garota do ensino médio tentando se encontrar na confusão da adolescência.Ichiri Sanjou, que gosta de skate, apelidada de "Icchi", pode parecer uma criança normal, mas sempre que vê a lua cheia, é atingida por uma onda de emoção que não consegue compreender.A história anda conforme ela aprende a arte-marcial Afro-brasileira, a Capoeira.

description.en:
At the Yotsuba New Year's gathering, Miyuki was names as the successor whilst Tatsuya was named her fiancé. Tatsuya and Miyuki's non-sibling relationship and engagement are now public knowledge. Among the shocked students the most shocked are those that knew the siblings.  
Meanwhile, the Ten Master Clans selection meeting, followed by magicians all over the world, is due to take place at a hotel in Hokone.  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 17-19.
description.es:
La sucesión al los Yotsuba y el compromiso de Shiba Miyuki se anunció a la comunidad mágica. Sin embargo, la Familia Ichijou de los Diez Clanes Maestros presentó una objeción. Mientras tanto, la atmósfera en la Preparatoria de Magia, el aire de respeto por los hermanos Shiba, que habían ocultado sus identidades, está siendo evitado, y Tatsuya y Miyuki se están aislando. ¡Un nuevo episodio que describe la nueva relación entre los dos ha sido adaptado a un cómic por el nuevo Takeda Hazumi!  
  
Adaptación de los volúmenes 17-19 de la novela ligera original.

altTitles.pt-br: Um Novo Aventureiro Velho Demais é Treinado ao Extremo por uma Equipe de Elite e se Torna Invencível

description.en:
It is common knowledge that it is best to become an adventurer when you are as young as possible, because the magical power that is the basis of an adventurer's strength will hardly grow if you don't train it while you are young. But this man, Rick Gladiator, who became an adventurer when he was over thirty years old, had the combat power of an S-rank adventurer, the highest rank in the world. In fact, Rick has lived an unimaginable life with the members of the legendary Orihalcon Fist, a party of the continent's strongest adventurers. From dragons to vampires, Rick's fighting prowess, trained by his literally "monster" mentors, allows him to defeat elite adventurers one after another who try to underestimate him.
___
**Character Designer:** [Tea](https://mangadex.org/author/71d4c549-2476-4803-a9c2-c48a15cc0fd4)
description.ja: 漫画を担当するのは、週刊少年ジャンプにて「レディ・ジャスティス」を連載していた、荻野ケン！ド迫力のバトルアクションと、怒涛のギャグ！　魂のこもったキャラが縦横無尽に活躍する漫画版をお楽しみください！！　『冒険者になるのはできるだけ若いうちがいい』しかしその男、なんと30歳を過ぎてから冒険者を目指したリック・グラディアートルは、新米ながら最高位[Ｓランク]並みの戦闘力を有していた。　伝説のパーティ「オリハルコン・フィスト」──ドラゴンからヴァンパイアまで、文字通り「モンスター」級の師匠たちに鍛え上げられた戦闘力でなめてかかってくるエリート冒険者を次々にねじ伏せていく。「出遅れ…？何歳から冒険者やったって何歳から新しいこと始めたって…いいだろ！」
description.vi:
Rick Gladiator - Làm lễ tân ở Guild suốt 14 năm nhưng vẫn ấp ủ giấc mơ được trở thành Mạo Hiểm Giả. Và ở tuổi 30, anh đã nghỉ việc để theo đuổi con đường đó.
Với người luống tuổi và khởi đầu muộn như Rick, sẽ quá là khó khăn cho anh. Nhưng rồi anh có được cuộc gặp gỡ định mệnh và được huấn luyện bởi Hội Nhóm Mạo Hiểm Giả mạnh nhất Lục Địa - Cường Quyền Orihalcon.
description.pt-br: É de conhecimento geral que é melhor se tornar um aventureiro quando você é o mais jovem possível, porque o poder mágico que é a base da força de um aventureiro dificilmente crescerá se você não o treinar enquanto é jovem. Mas esse homem, Rick Gladiator, que se tornou um aventureiro quando tinha mais de trinta anos, tinha o poder de combate de um aventureiro de classificação S, a classificação mais alta do mundo. Na verdade, Rick viveu uma vida inimaginável com os membros do lendário Orihalcon Fist, um grupo dos aventureiros mais fortes do continente. De dragões a vampiros, a destreza de luta de Rick, treinada por seus mentores literalmente "monstros", permite que ele derrote aventureiros de elite um após o outro que tentam subestimá-lo.

The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

description.en: Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?
description.ja: マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

altTitles.en: Aim for a luxury cruise ship!! ~Obtain a rich life in another world with a ship summoning skill~

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

altTitles.en: Becoming the Swordmaster Rank Young Lord of the Sichuan Tang Family
He Became the Head of the Four Heavenly Dang Family
Becoming the Sacheon Dang's Swordsmaster-Rank Young Lord

description.en: The Dang clan of Sacheon, once renowned for its poison and hidden weapons, is now on the path to its demise. That is, until Yeonmyeung Dang, an outcast boy of the clan, awakens by recollecting the memories of his past life as the 'god of swords' who devoted his life to mastering the sword. Will the boy be able to protect his family and fulfill his dream of living a normal life?
description.ko:
독과 암기의 명가였지만 지금은 몰락해버린 사천당가.
그곳에서 태어난 당연명은 문득 검에 미쳐 살며
검신의 경지에 이르렀던 전생을 각성한다.

'이번 생은 평범하게 살고 싶다.'

평범하게 살려면, 역시 검술 실력은 숨겨야겠지.
그런데 방해하는 것들이 너무 많다.

altTitles.es: La nueva vida de los gemelos

altTitles.th: ชีวิตใหม่ของสองแฝด

အမႊာႏွစ္ေယာက္ရဲ႕ ဘဝအသစ္

altTitles.zh: 双胞胎兄妹的父皇是宠娃狂魔

description.de: Wiedergeboren als Prinz und Prinzessin eines fantastischen Königreichs hatten Arienne Yuriana und ihr Zwillingsbruder Arhen gute Chancen auf ein rauschendes Leben voller Luxus. Aber statt in wunderschönen Palästen voller ergebener Diener zu leben und magische Abenteuer zu bestehen, werden sie vom Herrscher zu ihrer gewalttätigen Mutter abgeschoben – in ein heruntergekommenes Schloss voller grausamer Dienstmädchen. Als die beiden durch einen plötzlichen Unfall ihre Mutter verlieren, taucht ihr Vater wieder auf und holt die beiden Kinder in den Palast! Können Arienne und Arhen in einer unbekannten Welt voller Adeliger lernen, ihrem Vater zu vergeben? Oder ist diese Welt schlussendlich doch zu gefährlich für die beiden?
description.en:
Reborn as the prince and princess of a fantastical land, Arienne Yuriana and her twin brother, Arhen, should have been living a life of luxury… But instead of beautiful palaces, magical adventures, and attentive servants, the twins are left by the emperor to live with their abusive mother in a rundown castle full of cruel maids. However, after a freak accident suddenly leaves them without a guardian, their father reappears, saying that now he wants them to live in the palace! Thrown into an unfamiliar world of royals, can the twins forgive their neglectful dad and make the most of their new life with him? Or will this world prove too dangerous for the two of them to survive?

(The main story ends with Chapter 138, with 21 Epilogue chapters released afterwards.)
description.fr: En renaissant en tant que prince et princesse d'un monde féérique, Arienne Yuriana et son frère jumeau, Arhen, auraient dû mener une vie luxueuse... Mais au lieu de palais somptueux, d'aventures magiques et de servants attentionnés, les jumeaux sont abandonnés par l'empereur et doivent vivre avec leur mère violente dans un château en ruines rempli de servantes cruelles. Cependant, lorsqu'un étrange accident les laisse sans tuteur, leur père refait surface et leur annonce qu'il veut qu'ils viennent vivre au palais! Lorsqu'ils se retrouvent soudainement jetés dans cet univers royal dont ils ignorent tout, les jumeaux parviendront-ils à tout pardonner à leur père qui les avait négligés et croquer la vie à pleine dents? Ou bien, ce monde s'avèrera-t-il trop dangereux pour qu'ils puissent y survivre?
description.id: Manhwa The Twin Siblings’ New Life yang dibuat oleh komikus bernama Aidela ini bercerita tentang Nama Anda adalah Arjen dan Arien. Kami sama seperti anak kembar normal yang masuk sekolah menengah, tapi kemudian kami kehilangan nyawa karena kecelakaan mendadak dan kehidupan kedua kami saat anak kembar dimulai! Jadi kami tinggal di dalam istana yang ditinggalkan bersama dengan ibu yang kasar dan seorang kaisar yang berhati dingin sebagai seorang ayah. Tapi di hari ulang tahun kami yang ke 5 ... Raja tiba-tiba ingin melihat anak-anaknya. "Kenapa tiba-tiba saja?" Kami hanya bisa mempercayai diri kami sendiri! Mulailah Proyek si kembar Bertahan dari Istana!
description.ko:
"둘의 이름은 아르헨과 아리엔이라고 하지."

평범한 고등학생이자 쌍둥이였던 우리.
갑작스러운 사고로 목숨을 잃은 후 시작된
쌍둥이 남매의 인생 2회차!

폭력적인 어머니와 함께 버려진 성에 방치한
얼음장처럼 차가운 아버지, 황제.

남매의 다섯 번째 생일.
아이들 보기를 돌같이 하던 황제가 갑자기 아이들을 찾는다.

"갑자기 우리를 왜...?"

믿을 사람이라곤 우리 둘뿐!
쌍둥이 남매의 고군분투 황실에서 살아남기 프로젝트!
description.ru:
Нас зовут Арджен и Ариен. Мы были обычными старшеклассниками-близнецами, пока не умерли... однако нам была дана возможность вновь переродиться и опять как близнецы! Жестокая мать, безучастный и холодный, как ледышка, отец, старшие братья… «Почему вдруг мы?..» Незаметно настал наш пятый день рождения. Со дня, когда мы переродились, наше доверие проявлялось только друг другу. Но вместе мы сможем выйти победителями из этой неравной схватки внутри императорской семьи!

---
Нас зовут Арджен и Ариен. Мы были обычными старшеклассниками-близнецами, пока не умерли… Но мы получили возможность родиться вновь как близнецы! Жестокая мать, безучастный и холодный, как ледышка, отец, старшие братья… «Почему вдруг мы?..» Пятый день рождения. Верить можно только друг другу. Только вместе мы сможем выйти победителями из этой неравной схватки внутри императорской семьи.
description.tl: Ipinanganak muli bilang prinsipe at prinsesa ng isang bayang puno ng mahika, si Arienne Yuriana at ang kambal niya, si Arhen, ay dapat na namumuhay nang marangya... Ngunit sa halip ng magandang palasyo, mahiwagang kaganapan, at maasikasong mga katiwala, iniwan ng emperador ang kambal upang mamuhay kasama ang kanilang mapang-abusong ina sa isang sira-sirang palasyong puno ng malulupit na katulong. Gayunpaman, nawalan bigla ng guardian ang kambal matapos ang isang pambihirang aksidente, magawa kaya nilang patawarin ang pabaya nilang ama at mamuhay nang masaya kasama ito? O baka maging labis na mapanganib ang mundong ito para sa kanilang dalawa? Base sa sikat na nobela.
description.uk:
Нас звуть Арджен та Арієн. Ми були звичайними старшокласниками-близнюками, поки не померли ... Однак нам була дана можливість знову переродитися і знову як близнюки!
Жорстока мати, байдужий і холодний, як льодяник, батько, старші брати... «Чому раптом ми?..» Непомітно настав наш п'ятий день народження. З дня, коли ми переродилися, наша довіра була лише одна одному. Але разом ми зможемо вийти переможцями із цієї нерівної сутички всередині імператорської сім'ї!
description.zh: 双胞胎兄妹死于非命，谁知道异世重生的他们仍是双胞胎，还成了皇室子女。可是，他们就像被遗弃了一样，没有人在乎他们，还常常遭人虐待。父亲的突然出现，会不会改变兄妹二人的生活？

altTitles.ja: 高度に発達した医学は魔法と区別がつかない

altTitles.ja-ro: Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku wa Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai
Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku ha Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai

altTitles.en: Any Sufficiently Advanced Medical Science Is Indistinguishable From Magic
Highly Advanced Medicine Is Indistinguishable From Magic
I Used High-Level Medicine to Counter Magic

altTitles.ne: उच्च विकसित औषधी जादू भन्दा कम छैन

altTitles.es-la: La medicina altamente desarrollada no se puede diferenciar de la magia

description.en:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)
description.ja: 医療魔法が独占された異世界に転移した現役医師・天海唯人。スライム、キマイラ、獣人…はじめて出会う住人たちに驚きながらも、わずかな医療器具と自身の知識で、病魔や怪我に立ち向かう。果たして彼は異世界の住人たちを治療し、苦しむ人々を救うことができるのか。
description.es-la:
¿Funciona la medicina moderna en otro mundo? Sin trampas ni equipos modernos. Un médico se enfrenta a un mundo dominado por la magia. El doctor Amami Yuito es transferido a un mundo diferente donde la magia médica está monopolizada. Slimes, quimeras, hombres bestia... Le sorprenden los habitantes con los que se encuentra por primera vez, pero con el poco equipo médico que tiene y sus propios conocimientos, es capaz de combatir enfermedades y heridas.
¿Podrá curar a los habitantes del otro mundo y salvar a los que sufren? Una fantasía de "Mundo diferente" x "médico" sin trampas ni equipos modernos, escrita por Tsuda Houkou que además es un médico en funciones e ilustrada por el prometedor Takishita Nobuhide!

altTitles.ja: 黄泉のツガイ

altTitles.fr: Tsugai : Daemons of the Shadow Realm

description.en:
The manga centers on Yuru, a boy who lives in a remote mountain village, spending his time hunting birds and being one with nature. But one day, Yuru's younger twin sister Asa is called to serve in the jail at the heart of the village, her duty also confining her there. Yuru slowly unravels the unnatural mystery hidden beneath his quiet village.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/daemons-of-the-shadow-realm)
description.ja: 山奥の小さな村落に住む少年のユルは、野鳥を狩り、大自然の中で静かに暮らしていた。しかしユルの双子の妹のアサは、何故か村の奥にある牢の中で「おつとめ」を果たしているという。それはまるで幽閉されているかのように…。穏やかな村に浮かぶ不自然な謎、この村に隠された秘密とは一体…!?
description.ru: Сюжет расскажет о мальчике Юру из далекой горной деревни, который проводит свое время в единении с природой, охотясь за птицами. Но однажды его сестру-близнеца Асу призвали служить в тюрьме, находящейся в центре деревни. После этого Юру постепенно разгадывает тайну, скрытую в его тихой деревне...
description.pt-br: A trama acompanha Yuru, um jovem que vive em uma aldeia remota na montanha, onde vive da caça e se conecta com a natureza. Após Asa, sua irmã gêmea, ser chamada para servir na prisão da vila, Yuru começa a desvendar um mistério sobrenatural que envolve sua aldeia.

altTitles.fr: Coma héroïque dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja: 異世界おじさん

description.en: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

At the young age of twenty, Seol Mudok, a master swordsman, became the Lord of the Northern Sea Ice Palace. Plunged into despair after the death of his lover, he discovers that with the legendary flower, the “Lotus of Love,” that his deceased lover has been reincarnated. In his quest, he descends into another world…
description.fr: À l’âge de vingt ans, Seol Mudok, un maître de l’épée, est devenu le seigneur du Palais des glaces de la mer du Nord. Plongé dans le désespoir après la mort de son amante, il découvre qu’avec la fleur légendaire, le « Lotus de l’Amour », sa défunte amante s’est réincarné. Dans sa quête, il descend dans un autre monde…

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

description.en:
"I’m... back!"

After a comet collides on Earth, a gaming world filled with monsters and dungeons becomes a reality. Amidst the chaos, Gong Won-Ho wakes up as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, an almighty game character with exceptional luck and power.

Once again, he will embark on a journey to become the strongest... but this time, on Earth!

title.en: The Hunter Wants to Live Quietly

altTitles.en: The Hunter Wants to Live in Peace

description.en: Hunter Cha Euijae, sent to seal a rift over the West Sea, was flung out after closing it. When he regain consciousness, he found himself in a garbage dump—eight years in the future. Starving, he stumbled into a hangover soup restaurant and realized the world had changed. Now, disaster alerts warn of rift openings, slime ASMR videos are trending, and hunters livestream A-rank sword unboxings. Instead of the looming apocalypse, the future is oddly peaceful, leaving Cha Euijae feeling empty. Deciding to leave his hunter days behind, he chooses to work part-time at the restaurant. But his quiet new life takes a turn when he meets a mysterious figure in a gas mask…
